      • getVisibleRowCount

        public static int getVisibleRowCount(javax.swing.JTree tree)
        Returns a number of tree rows currently visible. Do not mix with JTree.getVisibleRowCount() which returns a preferred number of rows to be displayed within a scroll pane.
        Parameters:
        tree - tree to get the number of visible rows
        Returns:
        number of visible rows, including partially visible ones. Not more than total number of tree rows.

        Parameters:

      • promiseExpand

        public static Promise<javax.swing.tree.TreePath> promiseExpand(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                                                               TreeVisitor visitor)
        Promises to expand a node in the specified tree. NB!: The returned promise may be resolved immediately, if this method is called on inappropriate background thread.
        Parameters:
        tree - a tree, which nodes should be expanded
        visitor - a visitor that controls expanding of tree nodes
        Returns:
        a promise that will be succeed only if path is found and expanded
